titleStmt.title: A Bibliography of Blake Scholarship in the United Kingdom, 1972-73

publicationStmt.publisher: Department of English, University of New Mexico

hi.hi: 1972-73: A Bibliography of Blake Scholarship in the United Kingdom

div2.p: The editors have attempted, as far as possible, a comprehensive bibliography of all books, sections of books, learned articles, reviews, and reproductions of Blake’s art published in the United Kingdom during the period 1 January 1972 to 1 January 1974. Additional descriptive information, supplied by the editors, is given in square brackets thus: [ ].
